Posts.Content: sissy2010 wrote: Hi Everyone -  After a double mastectomy in 2010 (Stage IIb), I was placed on Tamoxifen for two years.  Didn't work, found out I had METS in December of 2012 (lymph nodes in my chest area). Was on Ixempra for 6 months and saw a reduction in size, but once chemo ended and I started Arimidez, lymph nodes increased in activity.  Starting on A/A this week and could use some advice on what I can expect.  Thank you all and best wishes. Dx 4/9/2010, IDC, 2cm, Stage IV, Grade 2, 1/31 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Surgery 5/9/2010 Lymph node removal: Left; Mastectomy: Left; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Chemotherapy 6/4/2010 Adriamycin (doxorubicin), Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Ixempra (ixabepilone), Taxol (paclitaxel), Taxotere (docetaxel) Radiation Therapy 11/19/2010 Breast, Lymph nodes Hormonal Therapy 1/2/2011 Chemotherapy 12/20/2012 Ixempra (ixabepilone) Hormonal Therapy 6/14/2013 Arimidex (anastrozole) Hormonal Therapy 8/27/2013 Aromasin (exemestane) Targeted Therapy 8/27/2013 Afinitor (everolimus) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: New to Afinitor/Aromasin - Recommendations? Results? sissy2010 pcrandall

Posts.Content: Aug 27, 2013 03:33PM sissy2010 wrote: Hi Fishwife - Thank you so much for the kinds words, made me laugh out loud.  Gotta find my "big girl panties" and get a move on.  I will post how I am doing on A/A (expected to start first dose on Thursday of this week).  I wish you the very same...God bless and stay so amazingly positive!!
